creative_testing.meaning: Testing unconventional opening lines to grab attention
Making users stop scrolling with unexpected visuals
That split second when a user actually stops scrolling

ad_formats.meaning: Ads that don't look like ads (but totally are)
Making people swipe through multiple ad slides
Those addictive 15-second videos you can't stop watching

growth_levers.meaning: When your best ad stops performing because everyone's seen it
Finding more people like your best customers
Getting your ads profitable again after iOS updates

campaign_scaling.meaning: Slowly increasing spend without killing performance
Making new ads before the old ones die
Throwing more money at what's working

creative_angles.meaning: Reminding people why they need your solution
Making people worry about missing out
Showing off all your happy customers

platform_hacks.meaning: Getting people to comment and share
Finding cheaper traffic on underused ad platforms

testing_frameworks.meaning: Testing every possible combination of ad elements
Collection of opening lines that actually work
Throwing spaghetti at the wall really fast
